How does it work? Where does it fit?
The Context Service Executives Need to Lead
KNOWLEDGE: What is possible? Options? Risks? Competition?
BENCHMARKS:  What are our metrics? How do we stack up?
GROUND TRUTH: How do we do work today? How is my team doing?
IDEATION: What are the changes we could make?
FORECASTING:  What impact would it have on the business?
ROADMAP:  What steps would we take to evolve?
SPECIFICATION:  What do I implement and how?
RESULTS:  How are we really doing against our goals?
RECOMMENDATION:  What should I do next?

Away from T&M and bespoke towards outcome and productized
SF Industries (Vlocity) not a fruitful platform target for Vibe coding
Foundation LLM’s accelerated on larger, language-based platforms
Lower cost app delivery not a market mover at 50% savings
Industry agents on Salesforce not a market mover either
Healthcare & Pub Sec slow to adopt operational AI on Salesforce
Platform for AI-powered generation of SFI/Vlocity components
Brand awareness in ecosystem as AI innovators
Agentforce service solutions in High Tech and Public Sector
Adapted quickly to market changes and feedback
We have assets, but are not positioned for exciting growth with current portfolio and operations
Evolve strategy, team, and operating model to drive growth across 2 distinct business units (see slide 8)
Value to shareholders: (a) ensure value of principle, (b) opens upside potential
Private and Confidential. Property of Synaptic Era, Inc. ©2026
Private and Confidential. Property of Synaptic Era, Inc. ©2026
Plan Forward: Run as 2 Complimentary Businesses
Leverage historical assets and new IP, brand and client assets
Hire new leader (GTM centric) to grow and run day to day
Fund modest working capital needs to grow services business
Grow 20-50% per year and sell for 2-4x multiple in 24-48 mo’s
Ensure capital return with growth potential
“AI Product” – attack new AI Agent opportunity
Launch new offering by end of Q1
Drive to $1m in 2026 sales and rapid adoption
Bring in new skills and talent to attack with velocity
Raise growth round on 2026 proof points and growth signals
Shot on goal for venture returns
Aligned with Discussion in October Meeting
** ASSUMES DUAL GROWTH PATH AND ADDITIONAL FUNDING **
* Negative balance show to illustrate cash requirements for modeled scenario
* Assumes bonus paid in March at 50% of full amount ~$318k total

Synaptic is seeking a Salesforce Services Leader with an incredible network within Salesforce, proven GTM and sales experience. This leader will drive growth while staying in sync with advancements in AI and agentic solutions, including Agentforce. They’ll leverage key relationships at Salesforce and ideally come with a trusted team, all to enable Synaptic’s rapid services growth.
Here are the profiles of the top talent Bill has interviewed:

As Synaptic aims to build AI-first, agentic solutions for the task and process mining industry, they are seeking a proven process/task mining product leader. This leader will develop the next generation of task mining products, supporting platforms like Salesforce and ServiceNow with agentic implementations, driving innovation in the ecosystem.
Here are the profiles of the top talent Bill has interviewed:

The Context Problem for CS Executives
No one has the the “Full Command”
Powerful AI Transformation requires broad command to connect the dots across domains and over time
95% of AI pilots deliver zero ROI (MIT)
85% of AI projects fail before proving value (Gartner)
78% using AI, 80% see no bottom-line impact (McKinsey)
